snippet: The idea of an east-west highway has been kicking around for decades. But a proposed private road has a good chance of becoming reality, and opponents say it would ruin the state.
abstract: Idea of an east-west highway in remote central Maine has been kicking around for decades, but a proposed private toll road has a good chance of becoming reality; opponents say it would ruin the state.
lead_paragraph: The idea of an east-west highway has been kicking around for decades. But a proposed private road has a good chance of becoming reality, and opponents say it would ruin the state.

headline.seo: Private Toll Road Across Maine Is Proposed
headline.main: Plan to Speed Travel With Toll Road in Maine Hits a Nerve
headline.print_headline: Plan to Build a Private Highway Bisecting Maine Draws Mixed Reviews
